definition.de: System der zivilen Vergehen und Delikte
definition.dk: Den del af et lands love, der handler om forhold mellem private.
definition.en-GB: The system of law focused on private rights and disputes between individuals in such areas as contracts, torts, property, and family law
definition.en-US: The system of law focused on private rights and disputes between individuals in such areas as contracts, torts, property, and family law
definition.se: Den del av ett lands lagar som handlar om förhållanden mellan privatpersoner.
definition.zh-Hans: 集中于解决私人权利和个人之间在合同、侵权、财产和家庭法等领域纠纷的法律体系
